PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^x3F6DB3^xE05030leveling regex:
b-b-|-b-b|b-.-b|b-b|r-b|b-r|nne
-------Bossing tips ----------- YOUR IGNITE WILL FALL OFF IF YOU RUN 1.5~~ SCREENS AWAY FROM THE BOSS
Swap deadly ailments for cruelty on bosses^7
^xADAA47---------------CRAFTING ADVICE--------------^7
Most items will be crafted by buying a fractured suppress or res item and using essences to acquire the other two suffixes/prefixes and crafting life etc.
^xFFFF77-------SADISM SUPPORT------^7^7
Currently feel as if replica emberwake + swift affliction > trying to made sadism work. The ignite duration becomes so low that the gameplay loop becomes much more frustrating to play.
^x70FF70----good early uniques----
TRY TO GET A CAREFUL PLANNING AND OBLITERATION(HELPS CLEARSPEED) VERY EARLY.
EYE OF MALICE OKAY AFTER EXPOSURE GLOVES AS WELL.
CLOAK OF FLAME IS VERY GOOD DEFENSIVELY EARLY ON.
^xD02090-----BARK SKIN-----^7
^xD02090Unfortunately, I didn't have barkskin numbers till after the video was recorded. Looks like it will be very good early on as a direct 1-1 replacement for tempest shield but you WILL need to use the shock minor pantheon + flask(or some other form of reduced effect of shock). This REALLY boosts elementalist's defense in early maps. The empty gem socket can go to something like blood rage if you take the fire mastery for regen. Barkskin after uber lab YEP
In lategame setup you will most likely have found solid charms by then so I would no longer use it.^7

Skill.label: 3L Flame dash Arcane Surge + flame wall
5L 6S Body armour selfcast surge till exposure
4L Curses use wave over surge till exposure
